item.title: Clean Up Bloated CQRS Handlers
item.description: We’ve all had bloated CQRS handlers. You open up a command, query, or event handler, and it’s a bloated mess. It’s a nightmare of code. There’s validation, authorization, state changes, side effects, logging, it’s a mess to maintain and it’s really hard to test.
